mapper.select: SELECT n.id, n.spu_id, n.sale_property_key_id, v.id sale_property_value_id, v.spu_id, v.sale_property_key_name, sale_property_value_name FROM `spu_sale_property_value` v JOIN `spu_sale_property_name` n ON v.sale_property_key_id = n.sale_property_key_id AND v.spu_id = n.spu_id WHERE n.spu_id = #{productId}

SELECT a.id, a.spu_id, a.sale_property_key_id, a.sale_property_key_name, b.id sale_property_value_id, b.sale_property_value_name, IF ( c.sku_id IS NULL, 0, 1 ) is_selected FROM spu_sale_property_name a JOIN spu_sale_property_value b ON a.spu_id = b.spu_id AND a.sale_property_key_id = b.sale_property_key_id LEFT JOIN sku_sale_property_value c ON c.sale_property_value_id = b.id AND c.sku_id = #{skuId} WHERE a.spu_id = #{spuId}
